titles.title: State Sales Tax Relief Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the deduction for State and local sales taxes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/14/2009--Introduced. State Sales Tax Relief Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2010 the taxpayer election to deduct state and local general sales taxes in lieu of state and local income taxes.
